item.title: [c21] Knight of the White Orchid
item.description:
Creature — Human Knight

First strike

When Knight of the White Orchid enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

item.title: [c21] Hunted Lammasu
item.description:
Creature — Lammasu

Flying

When Hunted Lammasu enters the battlefield, target opponent creates a 4/4 black Horror creature token.

item.title: [c21] Gideon, Champion of Justice
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Gideon

+1: Put a loyalty counter on Gideon, Champion of Justice for each creature target opponent controls.

0: Until end of turn, Gideon, Champion of Justice becomes a Human Soldier creature with power and toughness each equal to the number of loyalty counters on him and gains indestructible. He's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.

−15: Exile all other permanents.

item.title: [c21] Ghostly Prison
item.description:
Enchantment

Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

item.title: [c21] Elite Scaleguard
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

When Elite Scaleguard enters the battlefield, bolster 2. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.)

Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.

item.title: [c21] Orzhov Advokist
item.description:
Creature — Human Advisor

At the beginning of your upkeep, each player may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature they control. If a player does, creatures that player controls can't attack you or a planeswalker you control until your next turn.

item.title: [c21] Oreskos Explorer
item.description:
Creature — Cat Scout

When Oreskos Explorer enters the battlefield, search your library for up to X Plains cards, where X is the number of players who control more lands than you. Reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

item.title: [c21] Oblation
item.description:
Instant

The owner of target nonland permanent shuffles it into their library, then draws two cards.

item.title: [c21] Martial Impetus
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and is goaded. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

Whenever enchanted creature attacks, each other creature that's attacking one of your opponents gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.title: [c21] Sunscorch Regent
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

Whenever an opponent casts a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Sunscorch Regent and you gain 1 life.

item.title: [c21] Stalking Leonin
item.description:
Creature — Cat Archer

When Stalking Leonin enters the battlefield, secretly choose an opponent.

Reveal the player you chose: Exile target creature that's attacking you if it's controlled by the chosen player. Activate this ability only once.

item.title: [c21] Soul Snare
item.description:
Enchantment

{W}, Sacrifice Soul Snare: Exile target creature that's attacking you or a planeswalker you control.

item.title: [c21] Selfless Squire
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

Flash

When Selfless Squire enters the battlefield, prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn.

Whenever damage that would be dealt to you is prevented, put that many +1/+1 counters on Selfless Squire.

item.title: [c21] Zetalpa, Primal Dawn
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elder Dinosaur

Flying, double strike, vigilance, trample, indestructible

item.title: [c21] Windborn Muse
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flying

Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

item.title: [c21] Vow of Duty
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has vigilance, and can't attack you or a planeswalker you control.

item.title: [c21] Tragic Arrogance
item.description:
Sorcery

For each player, you choose from among the permanents that player controls an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a planeswalker. Then each player sacrifices all other nonland permanents they control.

item.title: [c21] Together Forever
item.description:
Enchantment

When Together Forever enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.)

{1}: Choose target creature with a counter on it. When that creature dies this turn, return that card to its owner's hand.

item.title: [c21] Witch's Clinic
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{2}, {T}: Target commander gains lifelink until end of turn.

item.title: [c21] Revival Experiment
item.description:
Sorcery

For each permanent type, return up to one card of that type from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose 3 life for each card returned this way. Exile Revival Experiment.

item.title: [c21] Yedora, Grave Gardener
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Treefolk Druid

Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, you may return it to the battlefield face down under its owner's control. It's a Forest land. (It has no other types or abilities.)

item.title: [c21] Trudge Garden
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever you gain life, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a 4/4 green Fungus Beast creature token with trample.

item.title: [c21] Sproutback Trudge
item.description:
Creature — Fungus Beast

This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.

Trample

At the beginning of your end step, if you gained life this turn, you may cast Sproutback Trudge from your graveyard.

item.title: [c21] Pest Infestation
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy up to X target artifacts and/or enchantments. Create twice X 1/1 black and green Pest creature tokens with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."

item.title: [c21] Veinwitch Coven
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Warlock

Menance

Whenever you gain life, you pay {B}. If you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [c21] Blossoming Bogbeast
item.description:
Creature — Beast

Whenever attacks, you gain 2 life. Then creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.

item.title: [c21] Tivash, Gloom Summoner
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Warlock

Lifelink

At the beginning of your end step, if you gained life this turn, you may pay X life, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn. If you do, create an X/X black Demon creature token with flying.

item.title: [c21] Marshland Bloodcaster
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Warlock

Flying

{1}{B}, {T}: Rather than pay the mana cost of the next spell you cast this turn, you may pay life equal to that spell's mana value.

item.title: [c21] Essence Pulse
item.description:
Sorcery

You gain 2 life. Each creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.

item.title: [c21] Blight Mound
item.description:
Enchantment

Attacking Pests you control get +1/+0 and have menace.

Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."

item.title: [c21] Gyome, Master Chef
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Troll Warlock

Trample

At the beginning of your end step, create a number of Food tokens equal to the number of nontoken creatures you had enter the battlefield under your control this turn.

{1}, Sacrifice a Food: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

item.title: [c21] Curse of the Swine
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile X target creatures. For each creature exiled this way, its controller creates a 2/2 green Boar creature token.

item.title: [c21] Crafty Cutpurse
item.description:
Creature — Human Pirate

Flash

When Crafty Cutpurse enters the battlefield, each token that would be created under an opponent's control this turn is created under your control instead.

item.title: [c21] Champion of Wits
item.description:
Creature — Naga Wizard

When Champion of Wits enters the battlefield, you may draw cards equal to its power. If you do, discard two cards.

Eternalize {5}{U}{U} ({5}{U}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Naga Wizard with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [c21] Rite of Replication
item.description:
Sorcery

Kicker {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.)

Create a token that's a copy of target creature. If this spell was kicked, create five of those tokens instead.

item.title: [c21] Reef Worm
item.description:
Creature — Worm

When Reef Worm dies, create a 3/3 blue Fish creature token with "When this creature dies, create a 6/6 blue Whale creature token with 'When this creature dies, create a 9/9 blue Kraken creature token.'"

item.title: [c21] Rapid Hybridization
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. That creature's controller creates a 3/3 green Frog Lizard creature token.

item.title: [c21] Beast Within
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

item.title: [c21] Arashi, the Sky Asunder
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Spirit

{X}{G}, {T}: Arashi, the Sky Asunder deals X damage to target creature with flying.

Channel — {X}{G}{G}, Discard Arashi: Arashi deals X damage to each creature with flying.

item.title: [c21] Hornet Queen
item.description:
Creature — Insect

Flying

Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

When Hornet Queen enters the battlefield, create four 1/1 green Insect creature tokens with flying and deathtouch.

item.title: [c21] Hornet Nest
item.description:
Creature — Insect

Defender (This creature can't attack.)

Whenever Hornet Nest is dealt damage, create that many 1/1 green Insect creature tokens with flying and deathtouch. (Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

item.title: [c21] Garruk, Primal Hunter
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Garruk

+1: Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

−3: Draw cards equal to the greatest power among creatures you control.

−6: Create a 6/6 green Wurm creature token for each land you control.

item.title: [c21] Forgotten Ancient
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

Whenever a player casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Forgotten Ancient.

At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Forgotten Ancient onto other creatures.

item.title: [c21] Ezuri's Predation
item.description:
Sorcery

For each creature your opponents control, create a 4/4 green Beast creature token. Each of those Beasts fights a different one of those creatures.

item.title: [c21] Kodama's Reach
item.description:
Sorcery — Arcane

Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

item.title: [c21] Kazandu Tuskcaller
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman

Level up {1}{G} ({1}{G}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)

LEVEL 2-5

1/1

{T}: Create a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

LEVEL 6+

1/1

{T}: Create two 3/3 green Elephant creature tokens.

item.title: [c21] Incubation Druid
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

{T}: Add one mana of any type that a land you control could produce. If Incubation Druid has a +1/+1 counter on it, add three mana of that type instead.

{3}{G}{G}: Adapt 3. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put three +1/+1 counters on it.)

item.title: [c21] Hydra Broodmaster
item.description:
Creature — Hydra

{X}{X}{G}: Monstrosity X. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put X +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

When Hydra Broodmaster becomes monstrous, create X X/X green Hydra creature tokens.

item.title: [c21] Return of the Wildspeaker
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Draw cards equal to the greatest power among non-Human creatures you control.

• Non-Human creatures you control get +3/+3 until end of turn.

item.title: [c21] Rampaging Baloths
item.description:
Creature — Beast

Trample

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.
